title: Famous Racetracks Quiz
description: Race through your memory of the world's most iconic motorsport circuits and tracks

questions.question: The Nurburgring Nordschleife, known as 'The Green Hell,' is located in which country?

Silverstone, one of Formula 1's most historic circuits, is located in which country?
The Indianapolis Motor Speedway is nicknamed what?
Monza, home to the Italian Grand Prix, is famous for being what type of circuit?
options: One of the fastest circuits with long straights

questions.question: Daytona International Speedway is primarily associated with which racing organization?

options: Public roads closed for the event
